location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Map of the Arabian Coast from Makatin to Bandar Janjari'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on Paper with Coloured InkDimensions: 530mm x 890mm

mods.abstract: The map shows the coastline and littoral of the Gulf of Aden between Makatin and Bandar Janjari including Sokotra Island.The borders of various tribal boundaries are marked on the map as well as the primary towns and settlements along the coast.
